entry.title: Bitcoin Legal Defense Fund
entry.summary: In an email thread on the bitcoin-dev mailing list, a member named Prayank suggested that the name of the Bitcoin Legal Defense Fund could be confusing or misleading for newbies. He proposed that the name should unambiguously clarify the fund's scope, such as "Bitcoin Developers Community LDF" or "Bitcoin Technical Community LDF" which abbreviates to BTCLDF. Another member named Jack agreed with Prayank's point and said he would come up with a better name for the fund. The email thread is open to ideas and suggestions from all members.
